level1.name: Overwatching Blade
level1.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **1%**.

level2.name: Governing Blade
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, gain damage immunity for **4** seconds when using **Sword Art: Icy Beckon** (unavailable in Apex League). For every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **1%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, gain an additional **2** weapon charge after the Wanderer uses any frost weapon skill. After using any frost weapon's skill or discharge other than **Alabaster Tiger's**, deal additional damage equal to **1,456%** of ATK to nearby targets.

level1.name: Lotus Dance
level1.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
After using **Whirling**, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **1%** for **2** seconds.

level2.name: Darkshadow
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
After using **Whirling**, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **1%** for **2** seconds.

level1.name: Chime
level1.description: Incoming healing is increased by **15%**.

level2.name: Deepset
level2.description: Incoming healing is increased by **30%**.

level1.name: Bamboo Splints
level1.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **1%**.

level2.name: Jade Luster
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **1%**, and crit rate boost duration is additionally extended by **2** seconds.

level1.name: Find Oneself
level1.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is **Onyx Tortoise**, normal attack damage is increased by **1%**.

level2.name: Selfless
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is **Onyx Tortoise**, normal attack damage is increased by **1%**.

level1.name: Steady Qi
level1.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **1%**.
While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming **Fighting Spirit** by **3%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **4%**.

level2.name: Attention
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **1%**.
While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming **Fighting Spirit** by **3%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **4%**.

level1.name: Counting Ink
level1.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increases to **1** per second.

level2.name: Taking Up the Brush
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increases to **1** per second.
When **Sparrow Feather** hits and triggers the spreading effect, it additionally spreads **Ion Scorch** and **Cross Burn**.
In team play, your damage taken from the aggroed target is reduced by **1%**. When Fortitude Resonance is activated, the damage reduction increases to **2%**.

level1.name: Synergy
level1.description: Increase volt damage by **0%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped.

level2.name: Enlightenment
level2.description: Increase volt damage by **0%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped. The amount of time that Grayspace Entities are controlled by Seal is increased to **1** seconds.

level1.name: Gnonno: Ripples
level1.description: After **Exploration Team Strike** triggers **Total Berserk**, increase final damage by **0%** for **30** seconds.

level2.name: Gnonno: Tidal Wave
level2.description:
After **Exploration Team Strike** triggers **Total Berserk**, increase final damage by **0%** for **30** seconds.
While diving, increase movement speed by **1%**.

level1.name: Twinkle
level1.description: Increase final damage by **0%**.

level2.name: Moon Reflection
level2.description:
Increase final damage by **0%**.
**Scatter Technique Enhancement:**
Hydro Focus Enhancement: Increase all elemental damage by **12%**.
Vortex Enhancement: If **Moonstar Bracelet** is in the main slot, damage caused by Vortex is increased by **30%**.
Torrential Force Enhancement: Increase discharge damage by **12%**.
Maelstrom Enhancement: When dealing physical damage while Maelstrom is in effect, gain an additional final damage boost, up to **33%** (maxes out in 10 seconds).
Aqua Shackles Enhancement: Aqua Prison duration is extended to **5** seconds while Benediction Resonance is active, and Aqua Prison's base resistance reduction is increased to **10%**.
Wellspring Enhancement: Resistance is increased by (**Max HP**/**100,000**)% while Fortitude Resonance is active, for a maximum of **10%**.

level1.name: Hoarfrost
level1.description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **0%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **1%**.

level2.name: Molten Feathers
level2.description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **0%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **1%**.

level1.name: Raging Fire
level1.description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **0%**.

level2.name: Towering Flames
level2.description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **0%**, and final damage is increased by **1%**.

level1.name: Dimension X
level1.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **1%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

level2.name: Dimension Z
level2.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **1%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

level1.name: Umi: Good Show
level1.description: Increase final damage by **0%** for **1** seconds whenever Umi uses **It's Magic Time**. This effect does not stack.

level2.name: Umi: Grand Performance
level2.description: Increase final damage by **0%** for **1** seconds whenever Umi uses **It's Magic Time**. This effect does not stack.

level1.name: Anisoptera
level1.description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **0%** for **1** seconds.

level2.name: Lepidoptera
level2.description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **0%** for **1** seconds. After Unyielding Wing is advanced to 1 star, receive Alyss's support when using a **physical/flame/volt** weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward.

level1.name: Gas (boom!)
level1.description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **0%** for **1** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

level2.name: Gas (boooom!)
level2.description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **0%** for **1** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

level1.name: Tian Lang: Thunderball
level1.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **2** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **0%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

level2.name: Tian Lang: Thunderclap
level2.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **3** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **0%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

level1.name: Heartswitch
level1.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by {0% for the entire team. Unstackable.

level2.name: Bless
level2.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by {0% for the entire team. This effect cannot be stacked. Additionally, increase your Max HP by {1%. Each time you successfully use the skill while having hyperbody or more than 50% HP, grant hyperbody to all allies for {2 seconds.

level1.name: Lin: Epiphyllum Blossom
level1.description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **15%**.

level2.name: Lin: Epiphyllum Glamour
level2.description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **20%**. Reduce all resistance of targets by **7%** upon hit by epiphyllums for **7** seconds. This effect does not stack.

level1.name: Saki Fuwa: Fortitude State
level1.description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%**.

level2.name: Saki Fuwa: Guarding Sword
level2.description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%** with an extra **60%** increased frost resistance. In the state of Silent Flow: After the sword shadow releases Surge and blocks an attack, the teammate with the lowest HP percentage will get 3 block abilities, not including yourself, lasting for **10** seconds. The maximum blocking damage does not exceed **15%** of the teammate's Max HP.

level1.name: Dreamcatcher
level1.description: Increases the flame damage taken by all enemies within **5** meters of Dolly by **8%**. This effect does not stack.

level2.name: Dolly's Domain
level2.description: Increases the flame damage received by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by **8%**. Not stackable. Increases flame ATK after throwing Dolly by **12%** for **10** seconds. This effect does not stack.

level1.name: Freeze
level1.description: Upon entering battle, gain **1.5%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds . Stack up to **10** times.

level2.name: Icebound
level2.description: Upon entering battle, gain **2.4%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds, with up to **10** stacks. Also, gain hyperbody and immunity to control effects while in the Frost Domain.

level1.name: Nemesis: Metamorphosis
level1.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **60%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **120%** of ATK.

level2.name: Nemesis: Sublimation
level2.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **100%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **200%** of ATK.

level1.name: Zero: Accurate Calculation
level1.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **1.5** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

level2.name: Zero: Overall Planning
level2.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **3** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

level1.name: Ene: Fast Mode
level1.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **12%**.

level2.name: Ene: Beyond Limits Mode
level2.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **20%**.

level1.name: Meryl: Cool Rose
level1.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **20%**, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by **50%**.

level2.name: Meryl: Frosted
level2.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **25%**, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by **50%**. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.

level1.name: Cobalt-B: Lingering Warmth
level1.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **50** to **120** points.

level2.name: Cobalt-B: Sparks
level2.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **90** to **180** points.

level1.name: Bai Ling: Valor
level1.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by **8%** for **12** seconds. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

level2.name: Bai Ling: Resoluteness
level2.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by **15%** for **12** seconds. Cooldown: **60** seconds.
